name: 206 Burger Company
featured: 206 burger. It comes with ¼ lbs of fresh natural beef, cheddar cheese, 2 strips of bacon and avocado.
unique: MASALA CHEESE BURGER AND MASALA CHICKEN BURGER. For masala cheese burger it comes with 1/3lbs of beef marinated in indian spices with pepperjack cheese. For masala chicken, it comes with 5 oz chicken breast marinated in Indian spices with pepperjack cheese.

name: Dick's
neighborhood: Wallingford, Broadway, Edmonds, Queen Anne, Lake City, Crown Hill
email: jasmine@ddir.com; Main office: 206-634-0300; left a message
featured: The deluxe. It has two 1/8 pound fresh, never-frozen, certified angus beef patties, with melted cheese, lettuce, mayonnaise and classic pickle relish.
unique: Burgers are fresh, never frozen; Our customers love that we’ve mostly stayed the same over our 64 year history. The burger you get today is the same one your grandma or grandpa got years ago. However, the deluxe and special were added in the early seventies; We also invest in our community. Our Change for Charity program has raised over $1.4 million for local homeless charities.

name: Feed Co. Burgers
featured: the Classic, which includes four ounce patty of Painted Hills Beef (hormone, antibiotic-free), special sauce (mayonnaise, Dijon and lemon), romaine lettuce, tomato and pickles.
unique: Bim Burger stands out (and is a personal favorite of Chef Scott Staples) as a unique option. It’s a six-ounce beef patty with caramelized Shiitake mushrooms, scallions, ginger and shallot integrated onto the patty, along with kimchi sauce, mayo and slaw (bok choy, daikon root and Chinese cabbage), pickled veggies (carrots, daikon root) and bok choy. Chef Scott recommends adding an over easy egg.
fries: fries, sweet pot, onion, cheese curds

unique: Our Bulgogi Burger is made out of thinly sliced Angus beef brisket with soy based bulgogi sauce made in house with herbs and spices. But it has to be marinated for at least 6-12 hours before serving. So it is the most difficult burger to produce which is why it is limited in quantity.

name: Katsu Burger
featured: the Ninja Deluxe.” It features our all natural pork loin katsu topped with bacon, cheddar, house made Tonkatsu Sauce, and our home made Sweet Japanese Mayo.
unique:
Now our most unique Burger would have to be our “MT FUJI.” It is the largest of our Mega Burgers featuring all three of our katsu meats, 3 cheeses, bacon, wasabi mayo, spicy mayo, and a cage free fried egg! We have had Man vs Food, Food Network, and the Cooking Channel all come out
the year to film the Mt. Fuji

name: Zippy's Giant Bugers
featured: Zip Burger with Bacon and Cheese
unique: All Hai King Lou Lou Challenge $17.95; We are probably the only burger joint in Seattle (that cranks out as many burgers as we do) that exclusively grinds their beef in house fresh daily and hand makes every single patty. Lots of places claim the hand formed patty. We’ve got the fresh ground beef. The cut we use is chuck. Comes to us 20-30 primal pieces. We trimmed it up a bit and then run it through the grinder. A much more time consuming and expensive way of doing things. We’ve done it since day one  and we won’t change it.
